detaileddescription.para:
Handle the drawing related tasks of the bars
bar
pointer to an object
mask
the object will be drawn only in this area
mode
LV_DESIGN_COVER_CHK: only check if the object fully covers the 'mask_p' area (return 'true' if yes) LV_DESIGN_DRAW: draw the object (always return 'true') LV_DESIGN_DRAW_POST: drawing after every children are drawn
return
true/false, depends on 'mode'

Signal function of the bar
bar
pointer to a bar object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Create a bar objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new bar
copy
pointer to a bar object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created bar

Set a new value on the bar
bar
pointer to a bar object
value
new value
anim
LV_ANIM_ON: set the value with an animation; LV_ANIM_OFF: change the value immediatelly

Set minimum and the maximum values of a bar
bar
pointer to the bar object
min
minimum value
max
maximum value

Make the bar symmetric to zero. The indicator will grow from zero instead of the minimum position.
bar
pointer to a bar object
en
true: enable disable symmetric behavior; false: disable

Set the animation time of the bar
bar
pointer to a bar object
anim_time
the animation time in milliseconds.

Set a style of a bar
bar
pointer to a bar object
type
which style should be set
style
pointer to a style

Get the value of a bar
bar
pointer to a bar object
the value of the bar

Get the minimum value of a bar
bar
pointer to a bar object
the minimum value of the bar

Get the maximum value of a bar
bar
pointer to a bar object
the maximum value of the bar

Get whether the bar is symmetric or not.
bar
pointer to a bar object
true: symmetric is enabled; false: disable

Get the animation time of the bar
bar
pointer to a bar object
the animation time in milliseconds.

Get a style of a bar
bar
pointer to a bar object
type
which style should be get
style pointer to a style
